headline: Datadog (DDOG) Tumbles 11.4% on Analyst’s “Sell” Reco
summary: Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) is one of the stocks drowned heavily. Are you holding any? Datadog fell by 11.4 percent week-on-week as investors unloaded portfolios following a brokerage firm’s “sell” recommendation on its stock. In a market note last week, Guggenheim Securities downgraded Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) to “sell” from “neutral” over fears that its revenues could erode if […]
